title: Morgenstern Academy
description: A custom WordPress website built from a Figma design to support an online education project.
The site serves as an informational and promotional platform for courses, resources, and community insights.
tools: WordPress, HTML, CSS, JS, ACF, Figma

title: Simyz IT Solutions
description: Custom WordPress website developed from a Figma design to serve as a personal brand and showcase platform.
The site focuses on presenting services, portfolio items, and brand identity.

title: Kozak Auto Service
description: Informational WordPress website created for an auto service business to showcase services, expertise, and contact information.
Built from a Figma design with a focus on clarity and usability.

title: Dr.Chaiter Medical Website
description: A custom WordPress website developed based on a Figma design to showcase medical services and health expertise for Dr. Chaiter.
The site serves as an informational and promotional platform that presents treatments, articles, and patient resources.,

title: Watch Faces
description: Informational and promotional WordPress website created to support and promote a mobile application.
Custom theme developed from a Figma design, featuring a watch faces catalog with filtering and individual single pages.

title: Heal Navigator
description: A custom WordPress website built from a Figma design to serve as an informational and promotional platform supporting the Heal Navigator service.
The site helps users explore a global directory of integrative and alternative cancer clinics, treatments, and expert resources.
